name: undreaming dreams [kpsd01506]
description: In my ongoing project KPSD98, I venture deeper and deeper into networks of pixels, and become entangled as an artist with my strange machine [1]. During the creation process, I use filters for locating and enhancing interesting pixel structures. In this technically endless creation process, my role as an artist constantly shifts between initiator and observer. What are the properties of the snapshots that I decide to keep? How long can I follow the trail of pixels before I end up where I started again? [1] A Windows 98 virtual machine running Kid Pix Studio Deluxe, a painting program for kids from the 90s.
